name: Sunshine Days
description:
You've been gifted the keys to a home of your own! Explore your new neighbourhood with your friends, and meet characters full of heart! Help them turn this mountain hamlet a thriving and green community!


Your home is yours to personalise as you desire, but the village at large is one big community. Share and explore this new world together!


KEY FEATURES:



- Customize your character!
- Move in your brand new house, and furnish it as you wish!

- Meet and help the residents of Sunshine Valley!

- Grow your garden, collect resources, and sell what you make!
